Aufer a nobis quesumus,
Domine, iniquitates nostras ;
ut ad Sancta sanctorum
puris mereamur mentibus
introire. Per Christum Do-
minum nostrum. Amen.

Take from our hearts, O
Lord, all those sins, which
make us unworthy to appear in
thy presence; we ask this of
thee by thy divine Son, our
Lord.

The priest here leaves you
altar; but first he salutes you:

jionem meam.
R. Et clamor meus ad te
veniat.

mercy.

R. And give us to know and
love the Saviour whom thou
hast sent unto us.

V. O Lord, hear my prayer.

in te.

V. Ostende nobis, Domi-
ne, misericordiam tuam.

R. Et salutare tuum da
nobis. .

V. O God, it needs but one
look of thine to give us life.

&. And thy people shall re-
joice in thee.

V. Show us, O Lord, thy

V. Deus, tu [conversus
vivificabis nos.
R. Et plebs tua letabitur

nvoke the divine assistance,
approach to Jesus Christ.

May the almighty and mer-
ciful Lord grant us pardon,
absolution, and remission of our
sins.

ndulgentiam, absolutio-
nem, et remissionem pecca-
torum nostrorum, tribuat
nobis omnipotens et miseri-
cors Dominus.
R. Amen.

He ascends the steps, and comes to the Holy of
holies. Ask, both for him and for yourself
deliverance from sin: ,
V. Dominus vobiscum. V. The Lord be with you.
